title: Aadhya Polki Kundan Choker - Contemporary Classic
features: A classic choker design reimagined with a modern touch. Features a central Polki diamond pendant with an intricate Kundan setting, complemented by cascading strands of rose quartz, emerald beads, and tiny pearls. The necklace is meticulously handcrafted with a rich Hyderabadi polish to enhance the gold's luster. A peacock motif with rubies and polki is used as a feature. The graduated pearl strand at the top provides a delicate frame for the gemstones.
description: This choker represents the perfect fusion of traditional Indian aesthetics with contemporary design sensibilities. The use of high-quality, uncut Polki diamonds and natural gemstones ensures exceptional brilliance and enduring value. The Hyderabadi polish lends an exquisite shine to the gold. The design provides a unique blend of vintage charm and modern sophistication, making it a truly timeless piece.
